title: Occupational Health Employee COVID-19 Information
cleaned_text: Reminder of key info for VUMC employees who test positive for COVID-19: - If you test positive for COVID-19, you will need to submit your test result to OHC [here](https://redcap.vanderbilt.edu/surveys/?s=CACNP8CW3C) - A few days after you submit your positive test, you will receive an email from Occupational Health to begin your return-to work process. Please check your VUMC email. [See this link](https://www.vumc.org/health-wellness/sites/default/files/public_files/PDFs/ohc/ohcWorkforceExposureGuidelines.pdf)for VUMC Exposure, Infection, and Return-to-Work Guidelines
